author: kristwaa
msg: DERBY-5475: Formalize use of old Derby distributions in test
Expose the release repository in TestConfiguration.
Removed some leftover throws IOException, and added some exception handling
to avoid one throws IOException clause.

author: af
msg: #i119537# Fixed extrusion of custom shapes to XLS.

author: markt
msg: Prevent buffer overflow errors being reported when a client disconnects before the response has been fully written from an AJP connection using the APR/native connector.
(Make sure the buffer is cleared on write error to prevent possible overflow if it is written to again before the connection is closed).
